Literature.Title: Segment-Based Peptide Design Reveals the Importance of N-Terminal High Cationicity for Antimicrobial Activity Against Gram-Negative Pathogens
Literature.Author: Mechesso AF, Zhang W, Su Y, Xie J, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=15 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis 1457(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli E423-17(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa E411-17(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E406-17(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii B28-16(MIC=32µM)
